verses.verse: Lord Jesus, think on me, And purge away my sin; From earth-born passions set me free, And make me pure within.
Lord Jesus, think on me, With care and woe oppresed; Let me Thy loving servant be, And taste Thy promised rest.
Lord Jesus, think on me, Nor let me go astray; Through darkness and perplexity Point Thou the heavenly way.
Lord Jesus, think on me, That I may sing above To Father, Spirit and to Thee, The strains of praise and love.
